name: class?: string
description: CSS class for the toast notification.

name: variant?: 'solid' | 'outline' | 'ghost'
description: Variant style for the toast notification.

name: colors?: string
description: Color scheme for the toast notification.

name: content: string | Snippet<[any]>
description: Content displayed in the toast notification.

name: withIcon?: boolean
description: Whether the toast notification includes an icon.

name: delay?: number
description: Delay before the toast notification is dismissed.

name: withCloseButton?: boolean
description: Whether the toast includes a close button.

name: onClose: () => void
description: Function triggered when the toast is closed.
